8 import time
9 import random
10 def random_coord():
11  """Generates a random coordinate
12 
13  Returns:
14  [int]: [integer coordinate]
15  """
16  return random.choice([-6, -4, -2, 0, 2, 4, 6])
17 def random_cmd():
18  """Generates a random coommand
19 
20  Returns:
21  [char]: [id of a command]
22  """
23  return random.choice(['m','m', 'd'])
24 
25 def talker():
26  """
27  initialize a ROS publisher.
28 
29  The function takes from the shell input (or generates randomly) a command and a point (if necessary) and publish it into the topic
30 
31 
32  """
33  pub = rospy.Publisher('/reaching_goal/goal', PlanningActionGoal, queue_size=10)
34  rospy.init_node('cmd_generator', anonymous=True)
35  rate = rospy.Rate(1) # 10hz
36  sendcmd = 0
37  x = 0
38  y = 0
39 
40 
41  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
42  #rospy.loginfo('Command: (m)ove ball, (d)isappear ball:')
43  #cmdt = raw_input()
44  cmdt = random_cmd()
45  if cmdt=='m':
46  cmd = PlanningActionGoal()
47  #rospy.loginfo('insert x and y')
48  x = random_coord()
49  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = float(x)
50  y = random_coord()
51  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = float(y)
52  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.z = 0.5
53  time.sleep(1)
54  pub.publish(cmd)
55  rospy.loginfo('Moving Ball!')
56  elif cmdt=='d':
57  cmd = PlanningActionGoal()
58  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = float(x)
59  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = float(y)
60  cmd.goal.target_pose.pose.position.z = -0.5
61  time.sleep(1)
62  pub.publish(cmd)
63  rospy.loginfo('Ball has disappeared!')
64 
65  else:
66  rospy.loginfo('Wrong command')
67 
68  time.sleep(20)
69 
70 
71  #""" hello_str1 = "hello world %s" % hello_str
